description:
Navigation drawers are an excellent component to use to set up the initial
layout of your application. This component combines a Navigation drawer
(a sidebar of nav items), an app bar, and displays any additional content.

style.description: An optional style to apply to the navigation drawer itself.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the navigation drawer iteself.

containerStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the navigation drawer container.

containerClassName.description: An optional className to apply to the navigation drawer container.

contentStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the main content.

contentClassName.description: An optional className to apply to the main content.

toolbarStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the main toolbar.

toolbarClassName.description: An optional className to applt to the main toolbar.

isOpen.description: Boolean if the navigation drawer is currently open.

isMobile.description: Boolean if the current device is mobile.

title.description: An optional title to display in the navigation drawer header.

menuIconClassName.description: The icon className to use for the main menu icon.

menuIconChildren.description: Any children required to render the main menu icon.

closeIconClassName.description: The icon className to use for closing a persistent navigation drawer.

closeIconChildren.description: Any children required to render the close icon for a persistent navigation drawer.

openDrawer.description:
A function to call that will open the navigation drawer. This will
be applied to the main menu button.

type.name: custom

closeDrawer.description:
A function to call that will close the navigation drawer. If the drawer
is persistent or persistent mini, this function is required.

divider.name: bool
divider.description: Boolean if this item should be rendered as a divider.

subheader.name: bool
subheader.description: Boolean if this item should be rendered as a subheader.

component.name: union
component.description: An optional component to render the `ListItem` as.

primaryText.name: string
primaryText.description: The main text to be displayed in a `Subheader` or a `ListItem`.

navItems.description:
A list of items to render in the navigation drawer. If an item
is a prop object, all props will be passed to either a `ListItem`,
`Divider`, or `Subheader` component.

##### Additional Info

toolbarChildren.description: Any additional children to display in the main toolbar.

toolbarTitle.description: An optional title to display in the main toolbar.

navHeader.description:
An optional header to display in the navigation drawer. This will be rendered
before the `navItems`. This will replace the generated header if you gave the
`title` prop.

navHeaderChildren.description:
Any additional children to display in the navigation drawer's header after the
`title`.
